pages.text: The key creation table is used to create... more keys! First, you need an $(h)Empty Key$(). Empty keys are found in dungeons and various other loot chests. Once you have an empty key, craft the $(h)Key Creation Table$(), plonk it down, and put the empty key inside it. Once you have done so, a random recipe will be generated. To complete it, throw the items onto the table and activate it with redstone.
$(o)Note: You can only place one key creation table. You cannot remove an empty key from the table.
